title: Discover These 3 Rising Stars in The Crypto World

title: Coinbase responds to Senator Warren’s allegations regarding regulatory influence
description: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase has issued a robust response to Senator Elizabeth Warren’s accusations of hindering cryptocurrency regulation through the employment of former government officials. The exchange, in a letter dated December 22, firmly rejected Sen. Warren’s claims, labeling them a “willful misrepresentation” of Coinbase’s intentions and efforts. Denial of wrongdoing and emphasis on responsible advocacy […]

title: UAE Tech Startup Zepth Integrates AI into Construction Management Software
description: In a groundbreaking development, Zepth, a pioneering global tech startup specializing in construction management SaaS software, has announced the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) into its platform, setting a transformative precedent in the construction industry.  The integration involves deploying 40 AI agents to achieve artificial general intelligence (AGI) status. This remarkable achievement places Zepth at […]

title: Opera’s Aria AI: A Game-Changer in Online Research
description: The well-established web browser Opera introduced a groundbreaking feature – Aria, its built-in artificial intelligence tool. For many users, this development appeared to be the final push towards making a permanent switch to alternative browsers.  However, after giving Aria a chance, it has proven to be more than just a novelty, providing a valuable solution […]

title: Yellow Card Crypto Exchange to pursue licensing plans in Nigeria
description: Following the Central Bank of Nigeria's reversal of the cryptocurrency transaction ban for banks, Yellow Card Exchange is actively seeking licensing plans.

title: Ethereum long-term holders hit record numbers, surpassing Bitcoin
description: The amount of Ethereum (ETH) owned by long-term holders has reached a new milestone, hitting 70% since Dec. 1.
